i18n.key: Title of the block on the site. If left blank, it will be generated automatically. In order to integrate the container's label, use the substitution parameter "{CONTAINER_LABEL}".
Select "yes" to show only certain types of news and events.
Check here the types of news or events that you wish to show.
Specify the maximum number of elements to display on each page here.
Specify the position of the pagination here.
Displays or hides the listed news and events categories.
Shows or hides the time (hour and minutes) in dates.
Displays or hides the block's title.
Displays or hides the listed news and event visual elements.
